evidence_example.title: Task demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the demo to test the BCC1, BCC2, FP conformance class, TaskActivate, Schedule, and non preemptive settings.
evidence_example.long_descr: This is the demo to test the BCC1, BCC2, FP conformance class, TaskActivate, Schedule, and non preemptive settings.
